Bio

Related

Stats

Historical

Biography

Senior (2019-20): Averaged 5.4 points, 2.4 rebounds and 2.8 assists a game • Shot 72 percent from the free-throw line • Played in 28 games and started 10 • Scored in double figures in four games and led the Eagles in assists twice • Tallied a season-high 15 points to go along with four rebounds and three steals • Averaged 5.5 points, 1.7 rebounds and 1.4 assists in 91 games during his three-year GS career.

Junior (2018-19): Played in all 33 games and made five starts • Averaged 7.8 points, two rebounds and 1.8 assists a contest • Shot 45 percent from the field and a team best 39.8 percent from long distance • Scored in double figures 13 times and led the team in assists in six games • First off the bench in 17 games • Scored a season-high 18 points in the opener vs. Carver • Tallied 17 points and three assists at Dayton • Hit a season best four triples and recorded 17 points and three assists vs. ULM in the Sun Belt Tourney semifinals • Tallied a season-high five assists twice – at Mercer and at South Alabama.

Sophomore (2017-18): Played in 30 games, made three starts and averaged 10.1 minutes per game • Shot .750 from the free throw line • Scored in double figures in four games • Netted 12 points vs. UTA (2/22) • Scored 11 vs. Louisiana (2/10) • Scored 12 points against Tennessee Wesleyan and backed it up with 10 points and three assists vs. Savannah State.

Before Georgia Southern: Spent the 2016-17 season at Santa Fe College in Gainesville, Fla., and will be a sophomore in eligibility at Georgia Southern • Averaged 14.7 points, 5.5 assists, 4.1 rebounds and 1.6 steals a game and led the Saints to an 18-11 record • Shot 52 percent from the field and 42 percent from 3-point range.

Personal: Born July 10, 1998 • The son of Tammy and David-Lee Jones Sr. • Siblings are Davian, Darius and Sedrick.

Major: Interdisciplinary studies.
